text:
Good work!
You did your best today.

Hey,
how about having a post-lesson party?

A free drink bar ticket!
It's the one we got last time!

Ah, it's the drink bar!
Hana-chan really loves it, huh~?

Eh, Haruki-chan, do you dislike it?
Are you tired of it already?

Hehe, not at all!
I'm not tired of it.

That's great!
So, it's decided then?

Yeah!
I'll hurry and get ready!
